attributes.action: The voters of the United Kingdom & Northern Ireland demand a General  Election
attributes.additional_details:
Too many Members of Parliament are refusing to the manifesto’s they were elected on & some have even changed parties & therefore no longer represent their constituents.
Personal vendettas are being played out in front of the world.
Members of Parliament are colluding with foreign governments to frustrate the will of the people.
This situation cannot be allowed to continue & therefore we the people demand the right to elect those we believe to represent our considered views.
attributes.background: With the current turmoil in a Parliament we demand that a General Election is held as soon as possible to allow us to elect a government that represents us. The current parliament that only seems to want to represent themselves with no regard for their constituents.
